name: Residential Tenancy Agreement (Ghana)
description: Short-form tenancy agreement for residential properties in Accra, Kumasi, and other urban areas.

clauses.clause_text: This Tenancy Agreement is made on {{agreement_date}} between {{landlord_name}} ('the Landlord') and {{tenant_name}} ('the Tenant').
The Landlord lets to the Tenant the residential property at {{property_address}} for a period of {{tenancy_months}} months.
The rent is {{monthly_rent}} (GHS) payable in advance. A security deposit of {{security_deposit}} shall be held by the Landlord to cover damages or unpaid bills.
The Tenant is responsible for paying all electricity (prepaid/postpaid), water, and internet bills incurred during the tenancy.
The Landlord is responsible for major structural repairs. The Tenant is responsible for minor repairs and maintaining the property in a clean and habitable state.

Either party may terminate this agreement by giving {{notice_months}} months' written notice. Failure to pay rent for {{default_period}} days shall entitle the Landlord to initiate eviction proceedings.
